On April 23, 2015, WordPress 3.8.7 was released to the public. This is a maintenance update for WordPress 3.8.6.

== Installation/Update Information ==
To download WordPress 3.8.7, update automatically from the Dashboard > Updates menu in your site's admin area or visit https://wordpress.org/download/release-archive/.

For step-by-step instructions on installing and updating WordPress:
* [[Updating WordPress]]

If you are new to WordPress, we recommend that you begin with the following:
* [[New To WordPress - Where to Start]]
* [[First Steps With WordPress]] or [[Upgrading WordPress Extended]]
* [[WordPress Lessons]]

== Summary ==
Fix database writes for esoteric character sets, broken in the WordPress 3.8.6 security release. Neither UTF-8 nor latin1 were affected. For more information, see [https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/32051 ticket #32051].

== List of Files Revised ==
<pre>
readme.html
wp-admin/about.php
wp-includes/version.php
wp-includes/wp-db.php
</pre>
